hw_lab2

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw_lab2.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of Roads and Locations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Context() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Location location) 
      boolean add(Road road)
      Adds the Road given as parameter to the current Context If the Road is already in the Context or it links Locations not in Context, an error message is displayed and the road is not added
      Location getLocation(java.lang.String name) 
      boolean has(Location location) 
      boolean has(Road road) 
      boolean isValid()
      A Context is valid if all its Roads link Locations in the Context and if no Locations or Roads repeat
      boolean link(Location location1, Location location2)
      Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance between the Locations it connects
      boolean link(Location location1, Location location2, long length)
      Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance provided
      boolean link(java.lang.String n1, java.lang.String n2)
      Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance between the Locations it connects
      boolean link(java.lang.String n1, java.lang.String n2, long length)
      Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the last parameter
      void remove(Location location) 
      void remove(Road road) 
      void remove(java.lang.String name) 
      void unlink(java.lang.String n1, java.lang.String n2)

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        A Context is valid if all its Roads link Locations in the Context and if no Locations or Roads repeat
        Returns:
        Whether the current Context is valid

      • has

        public boolean has(Location location)

      • has

        public boolean has(Road road)

      • add

        public boolean add(Location location)

      • add

        public boolean add(Road road)
        Adds the Road given as parameter to the current Context If the Road is already in the Context or it links Locations not in Context, an error message is displayed and the road is not added
        Parameters:
        road - the Road to add

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - - Location to search for in the current Context
        Returns:
        The first occurrence of a Location with name equal to the parameter

      • link

        public boolean link(java.lang.String n1,
                    java.lang.String n2)

        Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance between the Locations it connects

        Shows an error message and does not add the Road if either the Road already exists or the Locations given by name are not found in the Context

        Parameters:
        n1 - name of the first Location in this context to link
        n2 - name of the second Location in this context to link
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • link

        public boolean link(Location location1,
                    Location location2)

        Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance between the Locations it connects

        Shows an error message and does not add the Road if either the Road already exists or the Locations given by name are not found in the Context

        Parameters:
        location1 - the first Location in this context to link
        location2 - the second Location in this context to link
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • link

        public boolean link(Location location1,
                    Location location2,
                    long length)

        Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the distance provided

        Shows an error message and does not add the Road if either the Road already exists or the Locations given by name are not found in the Context

        Parameters:
        location1 - the first Location in this context to link
        location2 - the second Location in this context to link
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • link

        public boolean link(java.lang.String n1,
                    java.lang.String n2,
                    long length)

        Adds to the current Context a Road between the specified locations if they both belong to the current Context, having the length equal to the last parameter

        Shows an error message and does not add the Road if either the Road already exists or the Locations given by name are not found in the Context

        Parameters:
        n1 - name of the first Location in this context to link
        n2 - name of the second Location in this context to link
        length - of the resulting road
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful
